alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Haralson and central Carroll Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Bremen, or near Buchanan, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to penny sized hail and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Bremen, Temple, Mount Zion, Waco, Abilene, John Tanner State Park and Bowdon Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency.
